column4: I was wondering if ubuntu tweak works on 9.10? and i disabled the supend and hibarnate but I see them in the shutdown menu still. I did this in both the ubuntu tweak app and gconf-editor and still there?
I'm not familiar with "ubuntu tweak" but changing stuff like that typically requires you to log out and log back in for it to take effectr
I did and still no change should i try a reboot
A reboot shouldn't be necessary - I would try restarting gdm first.  sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart
